definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: In front of everyone there was a small bowl of soup with a small piece of meat inside.
sentences.chinese: 每個人面前都有一個湯碗，湯裏有一小片肉。

sentences.english: A soup spoon should be left in the bowl or on the plate.
sentences.chinese: 湯匙應留在湯碗中，或放在碟子上。

sentences.english: Place the soup bowl above the soup spoon and to the right.
sentences.chinese: 湯碗放在喝湯的勺子的右前方。

sentences.english: Shallow-scald shelled fresh shrimps with boiling water until just cooked, take out and place in a soup bowl.
sentences.chinese: 以沸水略浸燙蝦仁至僅熟，取出盛放在湯碗內。

sentences.english: Tofu is cut into small cubes and eaten in bean paste soup.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐被切成細條，盛在醬湯碗裏。

sentences.english: He tipped his soup bowl towards himself.
In America a person does not eat lettuce that way, nor pick up a soup bowl to drink what remains at he bottom.
sentences.chinese: 美國人不那樣喫萵苣，也不手持湯碗喝到見底兒。

sentences.english: In America anyone does not eat lettuce that way! nor pick up a soup serving to drink what remains at he found.
sentences.chinese: 美國人不那樣喫萵苣，也不手持湯碗喝到見底兒。

sentences.english: Just like the bowl of soup analogy.
Serve in individual serving bowls and sprinkle the rest of the parsley on top.
sentences.chinese: 倒進個別湯碗中，灑上剩餘的芫荽即可食用。

definition: variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]
